title: Unable to connect to the login queue
body:
Having the same issue as many others posted.
Played perfectly fine yesterday. Tried to log in today, unable to connect to the login queue.
Windows 7, so those running around saying "windows 10 is the problem" is unrelated.
My computer was completely wiped just 2 weeks ago, with only a handful of programs reinstalled. Everything is up to date.
Tried switching the dns to google. Tried using the HRT. Power cycled both pc and router/modem.
Tried to disable avast temporarily to launch LoL, as that was related to some of my past problems. No effect.
Trying to log in to NA servers from Guam.

Guess there's nothing else to do but play another game today, and hope it works later tonight, or tomorrow.

replies.body: Yeah there were a few players impacted by login issues last night.  I'm glad that everything is okay for you now!
Update: Now able to log in.
